events.message: Customer reported a car accident on May 9 causing significant front-end damage and lodged a claim promptly.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the accident details and vehicle involved.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer with the claim process and inquiries.
Claim acknowledgement sent to the customer confirming receipt and initiation of the auto accident claim process.
Request sent for accident report, photos of the damaged vehicle, and police report to proceed with the investigation.
Customer submitted all requested documents including police report, photos, and vehicle repair estimates.
Investigation into the circumstances of the collision began to assess liability and validate claim details.
Investigation concluded confirming the accident circumstances and damage assessment as reported by customer.
A settlement amount has been proposed based on fair market value repair costs and policy coverage terms.
Customer responded positively to the proposed settlement and expressed satisfaction with the communication.
Claim officially approved by claims manager following acceptance of settlement by the customer.
Payment for approved claim amount was issued to customerâ€™s bank account as per settlement agreement.
The auto accident claim was closed successfully after full settlement payment and customer confirmation.
All claim files and documents have been archived for record-keeping and future reference.
